titles.title: Energy Efficient and Environmentally Friendly Automobile Tax Credit Act of 2008
Energy Efficient and Environmentally Friendly Automobile Tax Credit Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for replacing an automobile with a more fuel-efficient automobile.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Energy Efficient and Environmentally Friendly Automobile Tax Credit Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual and business taxpayers: (1) a tax credit for up to $2,000 of the cost of replacing a passenger automobile with another passenger automobile that is at least 20% more fuel efficient; and (2) tax deductions for state and local taxes and loan interest for the replacement automobile.
